entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 02:24 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 02:24 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 02:24 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
